//     c21  = { 150, 500, 0, 0 };

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, -0.5, 2, 4, -3
    def c4, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 65504
    def c5, 0.5, 1.5, 0.25, 0.0078125
    def c6, 1, 2, 3, 15
    def c24, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0.0625
    def c25, 0.001953125, 0.064453125, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_1D78A86B_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s15
mov r6, c11 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    add r0, c3.x, v1.xyxy
    mov_pp r1.xy, -c15
    mov_pp r1.zw, -c18.xyxy
    mad_pp r0, r0, c3.y, r1
    rcp r1.x, c16.x
    rcp r1.y, c16.y
    rcp r1.z, c19.x
    rcp r1.w, c19.y
    mul_pp r0, r0, r1
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r0, r0, c1.y
    dp2add_pp r0.y, r0.zwzw, r0.zwzw, c1.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.xy, r0, c3.z
    add_pp r0.xy, -r0, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0, r0
    mul r1, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    add r0.z, r1.w, -c2.y
    add r0.w, -r0.z, c1.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    cmp r0.z, r0.w, c1.w, r0.z
    mov r2.x, c2.x
    mad_pp r0.w, r2.x, r0.z, -c21.x
    mul_pp r0.z, r0.z, c2.x
    min_pp r1.w, r0.z, c4.w
    rcp r0.z, c21.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    mad r0.z, r0.z, r0.z, -c1.x
    mov_sat_pp r2.x, c15.z
    mov_sat_pp r2.y, c18.z
    mad r0.zw, r2.xyxy, r0.z, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0.zwzw, r0
    mul_pp r2, r0.y, c20
    mad_pp r0, c17, r0.x, r2
    add_pp r2, r0.w, r1.zzxy
    add r0, r0.zzxy, c1.x
    max r1.xy, v1.zwzw, c8
    min r3.xy, c8.zwzw, r1
    texld_pp r3, r3, s4
    mul r4, r3.zzxy, c3.z
    mad r0, r2, r0, -r4.yyzw
    mad_pp r0, r3.w, r0, r4
    dp3_pp r1.x, r0.zwyw, c4
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, c3.w
    exp_pp r1.x, r1.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.y, r1.x, c0.w
    mul_sat_pp r1.x, r1.x, c13.x
    texld r2, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r2, r2.zzxy, c0.zzxy
    mul_pp r2, r2, c3.z
    mad_pp r0, r2, r1.y, r0
    mov r2.zw, c10
    mad r1.yz, v0.xzww, -r2.xzww, r6.xxyw
    dp2add r1.y, r1.yzzw, r1.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r1.y, r1.y
    rcp r1.y, r1.y
    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, -c3.x
    mov r2.xy, c5
    mad r1.z, c9.w, -r2.x, r2.y
    texld_pp r2, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r2.w, r2.w, r2.w
    mul_pp r3, r2.zzxy, c14.zzxy
    mul r3, r1.x, r3
    lrp r4.x, r2.w, r1.z, c9.w
    lrp r2.x, r1.y, c1.x, r4.x
    mul r1.x, c12.x, c12.x
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c12.x
    lrp_pp r4.x, r1.x, c1.x, r2.x
    mul_pp r0, r0, r4.x
    mad_pp r0, r3, c3.z, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c7.y, c7.x
    rcp r2.z, r1.x
    rcp r2.w, r1.y
    rcp r2.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r2
    mul r2.xyw, r0.xwzz, c24.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r2.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r2.x
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c6.w, -r0.x
    mad r2.x, r0.x, c24.w, r2.w
    add r3, r1.w, -c23
    cmp_pp r3, r3, c1.y, c1.x
    mov r1.xy, c1
    mad r4, c23.xxyz, -r1.yxxx, r1.w
    mad_sat_pp r0.xzw, r1.w, c22.w, -c22.xyyz
    cmp_pp r1, r4, r3, c1.y
    dp3_pp r1.w, r1.yzww, c6
    dp3_pp r0.x, r1, r0.xzww
    add_pp r0.z, r1.w, c1.x
    mad r1.x, r1.w, c5.z, c5.w
    mad r3.x, r0.z, c5.z, c5.w
    mov r3.yz, c25.xxyw
    add r3, r2.xyxy, r3.yxzx
    texld_pp r4, r3, s3
    texld_pp r3, r3.zwzw, s3
    lrp_pp r5, r0.y, r3, r4
    mov r1.yz, c25.xxyw
    add r1, r2.xyxy, r1.yxzx
    texld_pp r2, r1, s3
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s3
    lrp_pp r3, r0.y, r1, r2
    add_pp r1, -r3, r5
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r1, r3

// approximately 106 instruction slots used (9 texture, 97 arithmetic)
